definitions.body: carry a load (NH id.; Ph. [[עמס]] carry; cf. poss. Ar. 9amisa gravis et obscurus fuit dies (Frey));—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Impf. 3 ms. [[וַיַּעֲמׂס]] Ge 44:13, [[יַעֲמָס־]] Ps 68:20; Pt. act. [[עׂמְסִים]] Ne 13:15; [[עׂמְשִׂים]] Ne 4:11 (but v. infr.); sf. [[עׂמְסֶיהָ]] Zec 12:3; pass. [[עֲמֻסִים]] Is 46:3, [[עֲמוּסוֹת]] v:Is 46:1; —
load (obj. om.) upon ([[עַל]]) ass Ge 44:13 (E), Ne 13:15; so abs. Ne 4:11, lit., si vera l. (v. Be-Ry Ryle); but rd. prob. [[חֲמֻשִׁים]] Ry:Kau.
carry a load Ps 68:20 (´[[י]], for ([[ל]]) his people), carry as a load Zec 12:3 (fig.), pass. Is 46:1 (lit.), v:Is 46:3 (fig.).
